review_text: One of my favorite kitchen appliances.  This item arrived on time and is an excellent purchase.  I like it very much and am VERY glad I ordered it.  Thank you so much Amazon.com for the great price, good value and prompt delivery.  I use this item frequently.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
